message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be fair to propose a price of $1,100,000 for this exceptional item.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I recognize the value of your product, I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider a price of $900,000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your budget constraints, we are willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer for the product is $950,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  Could you meet me halfway at $925,000?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We understand your financial considerations and are willing to offer the product at $937,500. This is our best possible price given the value of the product.
Alice, this is getting very close to a deal for me.  Can we make it $930,000 and call it a deal?
